# 王峰十问 1~10

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/wangfeng-shiwen-1-10
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/wangfeng-shiwen-1-10
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install wangfeng-shiwen-1-10
wangfeng-shiwen-1-10 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g wangfeng-shiwen-1-yiling
wangfeng-shiwen-1-yiling <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
